bibl.title: Letter from Walter Reed to Emilie Lawrence Reed, July 27, 1900

div1.p: Reed teases Emilie Lawrence Reed. He expects to see her August.

div1.head: Letter from Walter Reed to Emilie Lawrence Reed, July 27, 1900
div1.opener:
C1
B9
Regards to Jacob,
Camp Columbia,
Quemados, Cuba,
July 27, 1900
No. 24
Friday morning,
My precious wifie:
div1.p:
Although
this is not mail day, I
must scratch a few
words to the dearest
woman in the land-
I got a nice letter from
little daughter last Wed-
nesday, but none from
Miss Farmer-lady! Why
did you treat me in
that way, fairest of the
fair? Or did you again
run up against hot
weather? Well, you have
been such a good, sweet
oomsey about writing to
your “hubby”, since he has
been away, that I must
excuse you this once-
Yesterday, we went down
to Havana and lunched
with our English Cousins
“don't you know”- They
are stopping at La Florida,
where every thing is very
nice in the way of food.
The meal passed off very
pleasantly, but I still
have the taste of one
dish in the far corner
of my mouth- I'm sorry
I can't remember the
name of this particular
Cuban Conglomeration-
It consisted, however,
of beans and coud-fishcod-fish
flavored with garlic!
and tasted, I imagine, bu just
as a monkey would taste
that had been dead, say
about 3 days! I regret
that the Cubans do not
can this dish, or I would
try to bring some of it
with me- I inquired, while
I was in town, about the
sailing of the next Trans-
port & was told that the
Rawlins, a very comfortable
boat, would reach Havana
on august 1st- She will carry
back about 3 companies
of the 1st Infantry & hence, I
think, won't get away till
probably august 3rd. and
will take 5 days to reach
New York- So that I think
my sweet wifie may be
on the look out for old Mr
Mantee about august 10th
somewhere around about
that date. Have every thing in
ship-ship about the ranch &
a plenty of vegetables & fruits;
and cool weather! Don't forget
about the weather, for I am ac-
customed to that kind! Love to
dear aunt Jane & Helen- Hug “fatty”
for me- Kisses & love for my dear
little girls-
